Room.Name: Rutted Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a deeply rutted road leading through the Chateau Richland Winery.
Room.LongDescription: Heavy wagons have been pulled down this road, and the ruts are deep. The vines on either side of the road are heavy with this year's crop of grapes, and the field hands who pick them can be seen in the distance. The road seems to run between a grove of trees to the east and some farm buildings to the west.
